channel.title: ComplexD tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from ComplexD.

item.description: A Solid Foundation? NIST Publishes Review of Digital Forensics Methods - Read the complete announcement and draft report at https://t.co/qfx8dzaAba. @NIST #DigitalForensics #eDiscovery https://t.co/S1e0P5mBUg

Ransomware-as-a-Service: Understanding the Cybercrime Gig Economy and How to Protect Yourself - Read the complete article via the @Microsoft Security Blog at https://t.co/6Q7LLHP3vG. #Cybersecurity #CyberDiscovery #eDiscovery https://t.co/beE6EaF3Rm
Over to the Offense? Ukraine Conflict Assessments in Maps (May 5 – 8, 2022) - Read the complete update at https://t.co/PN9HFsgDIt. @TheStudyofWar #Investigations #eDiscovery https://t.co/kIJvSF4snt

Relativity Speaking? @HaystackID® Delivers for Corporate Clients Migrating to the Cloud with #RelativityOne - Read the complete announcement at https://t.co/MFsIz4BmwK. #CGI2022 #eDiscovery https://t.co/0678ZoV7FN
Being Ripped Off? The eDiscovery Pricing Survey (Summer 2022) - Read the overview and take the survey now at https://t.co/OmRnBQg2Jh. #eDiscovery #LegalTech #Business https://t.co/tcQ2lCHxsW
Embracing Differences? Interplay of Digital Forensics in eDiscovery - Read the complete article at https://t.co/T9ZozCWWr7. #eDiscovery #LegalTech #Investigations https://t.co/12kiFoM79Z
